de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.mapping

Interface IMapper<T>


  • public interface IMapper<T>
    IMapper is responsible to collect information about the mapped class

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void executeLifecycle(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotationClass, T entity, io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.lang.Void>> handler)
      Execute those lifecycle methods which are annotated by the given lifecycle annotation like BeforeLoad, BeforeSave, BeforeDelete, AfterLoad, AfterSave, AfterDelete
      IField[] getAnnotatedFields(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotationClass)
      Get all IField of the current mapper, which are annotated with the specified class
      java.lang.annotation.Annotation getAnnotation(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotationClass)
      Get a defined Annotation of the given class
      Entity getEntity()
      Get the definition of Entity, if it was defined for the current mapper
      IField getField(java.lang.String name)
      Get the IField as a descriptor for the given field name
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getFieldNames()
      Get a list of fieldnames which are handled by the current mapper
      IField getIdField()
      Get the IField which is defined to be the id
      Indexes getIndexDefinitions()
      Get the definitions about indexes, which shall be created for the current mapper
      IKeyGenerator getKeyGenerator()
      Retrive the IKeyGenerator for the current mapper.
      java.util.List<IMethodProxy> getLifecycleMethods(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotation)
      Get the methods of the mapper which are annotated by the given lifecycle annotation like BeforeLoad, BeforeSave, BeforeDelete, AfterLoad, AfterSave, AfterDelete
      java.lang.Class<T> getMapperClass()
      Get the underlaying class which defines the mapper
      IMapperFactory getMapperFactory()
      Get the parent IMapperFactory
      IObjectFactory getObjectFactory()
      Get the IObjectFactory which is defined for the current mapper.
      ITableInfo getTableInfo()
      Get information about the table / collection inside the connected datastore
      boolean handleReferencedRecursive()
      This property defines, wether referenced objects inside a mapper are stored direct and recursive or wether they are read from the store by using an IObjectReference
      boolean isSyncNeeded()
      If true, then the mapper should be synchronized with the underlaying IDataStore
      void setSyncNeeded(boolean syncNeeded)
      If true, then the mapper should be synchronized with the underlaying IDataStore

    • Method Detail

      • getTableInfo

        ITableInfo getTableInfo()
        Get information about the table / collection inside the connected datastore
        Returns:
        the name

      • getMapperClass

        java.lang.Class<T> getMapperClass()
        Get the underlaying class which defines the mapper
        Returns:
        the class

      • getObjectFactory

        IObjectFactory getObjectFactory()
        Get the IObjectFactory which is defined for the current mapper. To define the IObjectFactory for the class, you will use the annotation DefaultObjectFactory
        Returns:
        the IObjectFactory to be used

      • getFieldNames

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getFieldNames()
        Get a list of fieldnames which are handled by the current mapper
        Returns:
        the mapped fieldnames

      • getField

        IField getField(java.lang.String name)
        Get the IField as a descriptor for the given field name
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the field
        Returns:
        an instance of IField or null, if field does not exist

      • getIdField

        IField getIdField()
        Get the IField which is defined to be the id
        Returns:
        the id field

      • getLifecycleMethods

        java.util.List<IMethodProxy> getLifecycleMethods(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotation)
        Get the methods of the mapper which are annotated by the given lifecycle annotation like BeforeLoad, BeforeSave, BeforeDelete, AfterLoad, AfterSave, AfterDelete
        Parameters:
        annotation - an annotation like defined above
        Returns:
        a list of annotated methods or null, if no method was annotated

      • getEntity

        Entity getEntity()
        Get the definition of Entity, if it was defined for the current mapper
        Returns:
        the defined Entity or null

      • getIndexDefinitions

        Indexes getIndexDefinitions()
        Get the definitions about indexes, which shall be created for the current mapper
        Returns:
        the index definitions

      • getAnnotation

        java.lang.annotation.Annotation getAnnotation(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotationClass)
        Get a defined Annotation of the given class
        Parameters:
        annotationClass - the annotation class where we are interested in
        Returns:
        a defined annotation or null

      • getAnnotatedFields

        IField[] getAnnotatedFields(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotationClass)
        Get all IField of the current mapper, which are annotated with the specified class
        Parameters:
        annotationClass - the annotation class where we are interested in
        Returns:
        found fields or empty array, if none is annotated with the given annotation class

      • executeLifecycle

        void executeLifecycle(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotationClass,
                      T entity,
                      io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.lang.Void>> handler)
        Execute those lifecycle methods which are annotated by the given lifecycle annotation like BeforeLoad, BeforeSave, BeforeDelete, AfterLoad, AfterSave, AfterDelete
        Parameters:
        annotationClass - execute all methods, which are annotated by this annotation
        entity - the entity to be handled

      • getMapperFactory

        IMapperFactory getMapperFactory()
        Get the parent IMapperFactory
        Returns:
        the factory

      • isSyncNeeded

        boolean isSyncNeeded()
        If true, then the mapper should be synchronized with the underlaying IDataStore
        Returns:
        the syncNeeded

      • setSyncNeeded

        void setSyncNeeded(boolean syncNeeded)
        If true, then the mapper should be synchronized with the underlaying IDataStore
        Parameters:
        syncNeeded - the syncNeeded to set

      • handleReferencedRecursive

        boolean handleReferencedRecursive()
        This property defines, wether referenced objects inside a mapper are stored direct and recursive or wether they are read from the store by using an IObjectReference
        Returns:
        true, if referenced objects shall be stored recursive and false, if an IObjectReference shall be used

      • getKeyGenerator

        IKeyGenerator getKeyGenerator()
        Retrive the IKeyGenerator for the current mapper. This method reacts to the annotation KeyGenerator . If none is set, then the method IDataStore.getDefaultKeyGenerator() is requested
        Returns:
        an instance of IKeyGenerator or null, if none defined or supported by IDataStore
